trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Om githyanki misslyckas med ett räddningskast kan den välja att lyckas istället.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Githyanki gör två Silver Greatsword-attacker.

action.name: Silver Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) snittskada plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) psykisk skada. Vid en kritisk träff mot ett mål i en astralkropp (som med {@spell astral projection}-besvärjelsen) kan githyanki klippa av det silvriga snöre som binder målet till dess materiella kropp, istället för att orsaka skada.

bonus.name: Astral Step
entries: Githyanki teleporterar, tillsammans med all utrustning som den bär eller bär på, upp till 30 fot till ett obebott utrymme som den kan se.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Githyanki lägger till 5 till sin AC mot en närstridsattack som skulle träffa den. För att göra detta måste githyanki se angriparen och använda ett närstridsvapen.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: Githyanki siktar på en allierad som den kan se inom 30 fot från sig. Om målet kan se eller höra githyanki kan målet göra en närstridsattack med hjälp av sin reaktion, om den är tillgänglig, och har fördel på attackkastet.

legendary.name: Attack (2 Actions)
entries: Githyanki gör en Silver Greatsword-attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: Githzerai kastar en av följande trollformler som inte kräver några komponenter och använder Visdom som trollformelförmåga (räddning av trollformeln {@dc 18}):

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Om githzerai misslyckas med ett räddningskast kan den välja att lyckas istället.

trait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: När githzerai inte bär någon rustning och inte har någon sköld inkluderar dess AC sin visdomsmodifierare.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Githzerai gör tre attacker med obeväpnade slag.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) dödande skada plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psykisk skada.

legendary.name: Strike
entries: Githzerai gör en attack med ett obeväpnat slag.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Githzerai teleporterar sig, tillsammans med all utrustning som den bär eller har med sig, till ett obebott utrymme som den kan se inom en radie av 30 fot.

legendary.name: Change Gravity (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Githzerai kastar {@spell reverse gravity} besvärjelsen med Visdom som besvärjelseförmåga. Besvärjelsen har den normala effekten, förutom att githzerai kan orientera området i vilken riktning som helst och varelser och föremål faller mot slutet av området.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: Githzerai kastar en av följande trollformler som inte kräver några komponenter och använder Visdom som trollformelförmåga (räddning av trollformeln {@dc 16}):

trait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: När githzerai inte bär någon rustning och inte har någon sköld inkluderar dess AC sin visdomsmodifierare.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Githzerai gör tre attacker med obeväpnade slag.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slående skada plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psykisk skada.

action.name: Temporal Strike {@recharge}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 meter, en varelse. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) smällande skada plus 52 ({@damage 8d12}) psykisk skada. Målet måste lyckas med ett {@dc 16} Visdomssparandekast eller förflytta sig 1 runda framåt i tiden. Ett mål som flyttas framåt i tiden försvinner under hela tiden. När effekten upphör dyker målet upp igen i det utrymme det lämnade eller i ett obefolkat utrymme närmast det utrymmet om det är upptaget.

reaction.name: Slow Fall
entries: När githzerai faller minskar den alla fallskador som den tar med 50.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Gnollen gör en bettattack och två kortsvärdattacker.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) genomträngande skada.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) genomträngande skada.

action.name: Sudden Rush
entries: Fram till slutet av vändningen ökar gnollens hastighet med 60 fot och den provocerar inte {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.

bonus.name: Rampage
entries: Efter att gnollen reducerat en varelse till 0 träffpoäng med en närstridsattack på sin tur, rör sig gnollen upp till halva sin hastighet och gör en bettattack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Gnollen gör två bett-, spjut- eller långbågsattacker.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) genomträngande skada.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} för att träffa, räckvidd 5 fot eller räckvidd 20/60 fot, ett mål. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) genomträngande skada, eller 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) genomträngande skada när den används med två händer för att göra en närstridsattack.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} för att träffa, räckvidd 150/600 fot, ett mål. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) genomträngande skada, och målets hastighet minskas med 10 fot fram till slutet av nästa tur.

bonus.name: Rampage
entries: Efter att gnollen reducerat en varelse till 0 träffpoäng med en närstridsattack på sin tur, rör sig gnollen upp till halva sin hastighet och gör en bettattack.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: En medfödd unge behöver varken luft, mat, dryck eller sömn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Witherling gör två bett- eller spikklubbsattacker.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) nekrotisk skada.

action.name: Spiked Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) genomträngande skada.

bonus.name: Rampage
entries: Efter att witherling reducerar en varelse till 0 träffpoäng med en närstridsattack på sin tur, rör sig gnollen upp till halva sin hastighet och gör en bettattack.

reaction.name: Vengeful Strike
entries: Som svar på att en gnoll reduceras till 0 träffpoäng inom 30 fot från witherlingen, gör witherlingen en bit- eller spikklubbsattack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Den grå renderaren gör en bettattack och två klonattacker.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) genomträngande skada. Om målet är Medium eller mindre måste målet lyckas med ett {@dc 16} styrka-sparkast eller slås {@condition prone}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} för att träffa, räckvidd 3 meter, ett mål. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) snittskada, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) förödande skada om målet är {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Bloody Rampage
entries: När den grå render tar skada kan den göra en Claw-attack mot en slumpmässig varelse inom dess räckvidd, förutom sin mästare.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Graz'zt kastar en av följande trollformler som inte kräver några materiella komponenter och använder Charisma som trollformelförmåga (räddning av trollformeln {@dc 23}):

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Om Graz'zt misslyckas med ett räddningskast kan han välja att lyckas istället.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Graz'zt har fördel på räddningskast mot trollformler och andra magiska effekter.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Graz'zt gör två Wave of Sorrow-attacker. Han kan ersätta en attack med en användning av Spellcasting.

action.name: Wave of Sorrow (Greatsword)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} för att träffa, räckvidd 3 meter, ett mål. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) kraftskada plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) syreskada.

action.name: Teleport
entries: Graz'zt teleporterar sig, tillsammans med all utrustning som han bär eller har med sig, upp till 120 fot till ett obebott utrymme som han kan se.

bonus.name: Change Shape
entries: Graz'zt förvandlas till en form som liknar en Medium Humanoid eller tillbaka till sin sanna form. Bortsett från hans storlek är hans statistik densamma i båda formerna. Eventuell utrustning som han har på sig eller bär på förvandlas inte.

reaction.name: Negate Spell {@recharge 5}
entries: Graz'zt försöker avbryta en besvärjelse som han ser att en varelse kastar inom 60 fot från honom. Om besvärjelsen är på 3:e nivån eller lägre misslyckas besvärjelsen och har ingen effekt. Om besvärjelsen är av 4:e nivå eller högre gör Graz'zt en Charisma-kontroll mot en DC på 10 + besvärjelsens nivå. Om den lyckas misslyckas förtrollningen och har ingen effekt.

legendary.name: Abyssal Magic
entries: Graz'zt använder Spellcasting eller Teleport.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Graz'zt gör en Wave of Sorrow-attack.

legendary.name: Dance, My Puppet!
entries: En varelse {@condition charmed} vid Graz'zt som Graz'zt kan se måste använda sin reaktion för att röra sig upp till sin hastighet enligt Graz'zts anvisningar.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Abishai kastar en av följande trollformler som inte kräver några materiella komponenter och använder Charisma som trollformelförmåga (räddning av trollformeln {@dc 17}):

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magiskt mörker hindrar inte abishais {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Abishai har fördel på räddningskast mot trollformler och andra magiska effekter.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Abishai gör två Fiendish Claw-attacker, eller så gör den en Fiendish Claw-attack och använder Spellcasting.

action.name: Fiendish Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) kraftskada. Om målet är en varelse måste den lyckas med ett {@dc 16} Konstitutionssparande kast eller ta 16 ({@damage 3d10}) giftskador och bli {@condition poisoned} i 1 minut. {@condition poisoned}-målet kan upprepa räddningskastet i slutet av var och en av sina vändor, vilket avslutar effekten på sig själv om det lyckas.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Grung kan andas luft och vatten.

trait.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: Varje varelse som griper tag i grung eller på annat sätt kommer i direktkontakt med grungens hud måste lyckas med ett {@dc 12} räddningskast på konstitutionen eller bli {@condition poisoned} i 1 minut. En {@condition poisoned} varelse som inte längre är i direktkontakt med grungan kan upprepa räddningskastet i slutet av var och en av sina vändor och avsluta effekten på sig själv om den lyckas.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: Grungens längdhopp är upp till 25 fot och dess höjdhopp är upp till 15 fot, med eller utan start.

trait.name: Water Dependency
entries: Om grung inte är nedsänkt i vatten i minst 1 timme under en dag lider den av 1 nivå av {@condition exhaustion} i slutet av den dagen. Grungen kan återhämta sig från denna {@condition exhaustion} endast genom magi eller genom att sänka sig i vatten i minst 1 timme.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} för att träffa, räckvidd 5 fot eller räckvidd 20/60 fot, ett mål. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) stickande skada plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) giftskada.

variant.name: Grung Poison
entries: En varelse {@condition poisoned} av en grung kan drabbas av en extra effekt som beror på grungens färg, enligt beskrivningen nedan. Den här effekten varar tills varelsen inte längre är {@condition poisoned} av grungen.

entries.name: Blue Grung
entries: {@condition poisoned} varelsen måste göra ett högt ljud i början och slutet av sin tur.

entries.name: Gold Grung
entries: Varelsen är {@condition charmed} av Grung och kan tala Grung.

entries.name: Green Grung
entries: {@condition poisoned} kan inte röra sig utom för att klättra eller göra stående hopp. Om varelsen flyger kan den inte utföra några handlingar eller reaktioner om den inte landar.

entries.name: Orange Grung
entries: Den {@condition poisoned} varelsen är {@condition frightened} av sina allierade.

entries.name: Purple Grung
entries: {@condition poisoned} varelsen känner ett desperat behov av att blöta ner sig i vätska eller lera. Den kan inte vidta åtgärder eller röra sig utom för att göra det eller för att nå en kropp av vätska eller lera.

entries.name: Red Grung
entries: {@condition poisoned} varelsen måste använda sin handling för att äta om mat finns inom räckhåll.

items.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: En varelse {@condition poisoned} av en grung drabbas av en extra effekt som beror på grungens färg. Denna effekt varar tills varelsen inte längre är {@condition poisoned} av grung. Den {@condition poisoned} varelsen måste göra ett högt ljud i början och slutet av sin tur.

items.name: Poisonous Skin

entries: En varelse {@condition poisoned} av en grung drabbas av en extra effekt som beror på grungens färg. Denna effekt varar tills varelsen inte längre är {@condition poisoned} av grung. Den {@condition poisoned} varelsen kan inte röra sig utom för att klättra eller göra stående hopp. Om varelsen flyger kan den inte göra några handlingar eller reaktioner om den inte landar.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 80/320 fot, ett mål. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) genomträngande skada plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) giftskada.

action.name: Mesmerizing Chirr {@recharge}
entries: Grungen gör ett kvittrande ljud som grungs är immuna mot. Varje Humanoid eller Beast som befinner sig inom 15 fot från grungen och som kan höra den måste lyckas med ett {@dc 12} Visdomssparkast eller bli {@condition stunned} tills slutet av grungens nästa tur.

headerEntries: Grung kastar en av följande trollformler, med Visdom som trollformelförmåga (räddning av trollformeln {@dc 12}):

entries: Grung kan andas luft och vatten.

trait.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: Varje varelse som griper tag i grung eller på annat sätt kommer i direktkontakt med grungens hud måste lyckas med ett {@dc 12} räddningskast på konstitutionen eller bli {@condition poisoned} i 1 minut. En {@condition poisoned} varelse som inte längre är i direktkontakt med grungan kan upprepa räddningskastet i slutet av var och en av sina vändor och avsluta effekten på sig själv om den lyckas.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: Grungens längdhopp är upp till 25 fot och dess höjdhopp är upp till 15 fot, med eller utan start.

trait.name: Water Dependency
entries: Om grung inte är nedsänkt i vatten i minst 1 timme under en dag lider den av 1 nivå av {@condition exhaustion} i slutet av den dagen. Grungen kan återhämta sig från denna {@condition exhaustion} endast genom magi eller genom att sänka sig i vatten i minst 1 timme.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 5 fot eller räckvidd 20/60 fot, ett mål. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) stickande skada plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) giftskada.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 80/320 fot, ett mål. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) genomträngande skada plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) giftskada.

variant.name: Grung Poison
entries: En varelse {@condition poisoned} av en grung kan drabbas av en extra effekt som beror på grungens färg, enligt beskrivningen nedan. Den här effekten varar tills varelsen inte längre är {@condition poisoned} av grungen.

entries.name: Blue Grung
entries: {@condition poisoned} varelsen måste göra ett högt ljud i början och slutet av sin tur.

entries.name: Gold Grung
entries: Varelsen är {@condition charmed} av Grung och kan tala Grung.

entries.name: Green Grung
entries: {@condition poisoned} kan inte röra sig utom för att klättra eller göra stående hopp. Om varelsen flyger kan den inte utföra några handlingar eller reaktioner om den inte landar.

entries.name: Orange Grung
entries: Den {@condition poisoned} varelsen är {@condition frightened} av sina allierade.

entries.name: Purple Grung
entries: {@condition poisoned} varelsen känner ett desperat behov av att blöta ner sig i vätska eller lera. Den kan inte vidta åtgärder eller röra sig utom för att göra det eller för att nå en kropp av vätska eller lera.

entries.name: Red Grung
entries: {@condition poisoned} varelsen måste använda sin handling för att äta om mat finns inom räckhåll.

items.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: En varelse {@condition poisoned} av en grung drabbas av en extra effekt som beror på grungens färg. Denna effekt varar tills varelsen inte längre är {@condition poisoned} av grung. Den {@condition poisoned} varelsen måste göra ett högt ljud i början och slutet av sin tur.

items.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: En varelse {@condition poisoned} av en grung drabbas av en extra effekt som beror på grungens färg. Denna effekt varar tills varelsen inte längre är {@condition poisoned} av grung. Varelsen är {@condition charmed} av grung och kan tala grung.

items.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: En varelse {@condition poisoned} av en grung drabbas av en extra effekt som beror på grungens färg. Denna effekt varar tills varelsen inte längre är {@condition poisoned} av grung. Den {@condition poisoned} varelsen kan inte röra sig utom för att klättra eller göra stående hopp. Om varelsen flyger kan den inte göra några handlingar eller reaktioner om den inte landar.

items.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: En varelse {@condition poisoned} av en grung drabbas av en extra effekt som beror på grungens färg. Denna effekt varar tills varelsen inte längre är {@condition poisoned} av grung. Den {@condition poisoned} varelsen är {@condition frightened} av sina allierade.

items.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: En varelse {@condition poisoned} av en grung drabbas av en extra effekt som beror på grungens färg. Denna effekt varar tills varelsen inte längre är {@condition poisoned} av grung. Den {@condition poisoned} varelsen känner ett desperat behov av att dränka sig i vätska eller lera. Den kan inte vidta åtgärder eller röra sig utom för att göra det eller för att nå en kropp av vätska eller lera.

items.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: En varelse {@condition poisoned} av en grung drabbas av en extra effekt som beror på grungens färg. Denna effekt varar tills varelsen inte längre är {@condition poisoned} av grung. Den {@condition poisoned} varelsen måste använda sin handling för att äta om mat finns inom räckhåll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Den vakande draken gör en bettattack och en
Attack på svansen.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) genomträngande skada.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) blåslagningsskada.

variant.name: Chromatic Drakes
entries: Varje typ av kromatisk drakes fjäll skapar en vaktdrake som liknar en vinglös, förkrympt version av den typen av drake, med unika förmågor relaterade till den typen. Var och en har de speciella egenskaper som beskrivs nedan.

entries.name: Black Guard Drake
entries: Draken kan andas luft och vatten, har en simhastighet på 30 fot och är motståndskraftig mot syreskador.

entries.name: Blue Guard Drake
entries: Draken har en grävhastighet på 20 fot och motståndskraft mot blixtskador.

entries.name: Green Guard Drake
entries: Draken kan andas luft och vatten, har en simhastighet på 30 fot och är motståndskraftig mot giftskador.

entries.name: Red Guard Drake
entries: Draken har en klättringshastighet på 30 fot och är motståndskraftig mot brandskador.

entries.name: White Guard Drake
entries: Draken har en grävhastighet på 20 fot, en klättringshastighet på 30 fot och motståndskraft mot köldskador.

items.name: Amphibious
entries: Draken kan andas luft och vatten.

items.name: Amphibious
entries: Draken kan andas luft och vatten.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) blåslagningsskada.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Hellfire-motorn är immun mot alla besvärjelser eller effekter som kan förändra dess form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Hellfire-motorn har fördel på räddningskast mot trollformler och andra magiska effekter.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: Hellfire-motorn behöver varken luft, mat, dryck eller sömn.

action.name: Flesh-Crushing Stride
entries: Hellfire-motorn går upp till sin hastighet i en rak linje. Under denna rörelse kan den gå in i stora eller mindre varelsers utrymmen. En varelse vars utrymme helveteseldsmotorn kommer in i måste göra ett {@dc 18} Dexterity räddningskast. Vid ett lyckat räddningsförsök knuffas varelsen till närmaste utrymme utanför helveteseldmaskinens väg. Vid ett misslyckat räddningsförsök faller varelsen {@condition prone} och tar 28 ({@damage 8d6}) slagskador.

Om helveteseldsmotorn stannar kvar i {@condition prone} varelsens utrymme är varelsen också {@condition restrained} tills den inte längre befinner sig i samma utrymme som helveteseldsmotorn. Medan {@condition restrained} på detta sätt kan varelsen, eller en annan varelse inom 5 fot från den, göra en {@dc 18} styrkaskontroll. Vid en framgång shuntas varelsen till ett obebott utrymme som den själv väljer inom 5 fot från helveteseldsmotorn och är inte längre {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Hellfire Weapons
entries: Hellfire-motorn använder ett av följande alternativ (välj ett eller rulla en {@dice d6}):

items.name: 1–2: Bonemelt Sprayer
entries: Hellfire-motorn sprutar sura lågor i en 60 fot lång kon. Varje varelse i konen måste göra ett {@dc 20} räddningskast för att rädda sig. Vid ett misslyckat räddningskast tar den 11 ({@damage 2d10}) brandskador plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) syraskador, eller hälften så mycket skada vid ett lyckat räddningskast. Varelser som misslyckas med räddningskastet dränks i brinnande syra och tar 5 ({@damage 1d10}) brandskador plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) syreskador i slutet av sina turer. En drabbad varelse eller en annan varelse inom 5 fot från den kan ta en handling för att skrapa bort det brinnande bränslet.

items.name: 3–4: Lightning Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} för att träffa, räckvidd 15 fot, en varelse. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) smällande skada plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) blixtskada. Upp till tre andra varelser av helveteseldmaskinens val som den kan se inom 30 fot från målet måste var och en göra ett {@dc 20} räddningskast för Dexterity, och tar 22 ({@damage 5d8} blixtskada vid ett misslyckat räddningskast, eller hälften så mycket skada vid ett lyckat.

items.name: 5–6: Thunder Cannon
entries: Hellfire-motorn siktar på en punkt inom 120 fot från den som den kan se. Varje varelse inom 30 fot från den punkten måste göra ett {@dc 20} Dexterity räddningskast, och tar 27 ({@damage 5d10}) slagskador plus 19 ({@damage 3d12} åskskskador på ett misslyckat räddningskast, eller hälften så mycket skada på ett lyckat.

Om det valda alternativet dödar en varelse, stiger varelsens själ upp ur floden Styx som en {@creature lemure} i Avernus om {@dice 1d4} timmar. Om varelsen inte återupplivas innan dess kan endast en {@spell wish} besvärjelse eller att döda {@creature lemure} och kasta sann återuppståndelse på varelsens ursprungliga kropp återställa den till liv. Konstruktioner och djävlar är immuna mot den här effekten.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Hobgoblinen kastar en av följande trollformler, med intelligens som trollformelförmåga (räddning av trollformeln {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Army Arcana
entries: När hobgoblinen kastar en besvärjelse som orsakar skada eller som tvingar andra varelser att göra ett räddningskast kan den välja sig själv och ett valfritt antal allierade att vara immuna mot den skada som besvärjelsen orsakar och att lyckas på det krävda räddningskastet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Hobgoblinen gör två attacker med Quarterstaff eller Devastating Bolt.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) smällande skada, eller 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) smällande skada om den används med två händer, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8} kraftskada.

action.name: Devastating Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 60 fot, ett mål. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) kraftskada, och målet slås {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Hobgoblinen kastar en av följande trollformler, med intelligens som trollformelförmåga (räddning av trollformeln {@dc 12}):

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: När hobgoblinen inte bär någon rustning och inte har någon sköld, inkluderar dess AC sin visdomsmodifierare.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Hobgoblinen gör fyra attacker, som var och en kan vara ett obeväpnat slag eller en pilattack. Den kan också använda
Shadow Jaunt en gång, antingen före eller efter en av attackerna.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) blåslagningsskada.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 20/60 fot, ett mål. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) genomträngande skada.

action.name: Shadow Jaunt
entries: Hobgoblinen teleporterar, tillsammans med all utrustning som den bär eller bär på, upp till 30 fot till ett obebott utrymme som den kan se. Både utrymmet den lämnar och dess destination måste vara i svagt ljus eller mörker.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: En bröllopare har fördel på attackkast mot en varelse om minst en av brölloparens allierade befinner sig inom 1,5 meter från varelsen och den allierade inte är det {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Brölaren gör två bettattacker.

action.name: Rending Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) stickande skada, plus 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psykisk skada om målet är {@condition frightened}. Den här attacken ignorerar skaderesistens.

action.name: Mind-Breaking Howl {@recharge 4}
entries: Brölkarlen avger ett kvidande tjut i en 60 fot lång kon. Varje varelse i det området måste lyckas med ett {@dc 13} Visdomssparandekast eller ta 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psykisk skada och vara {@condition frightened} tills slutet av brölarens nästa tur. Medan en varelse är {@condition frightened} på detta sätt halveras dess hastighet och den är {@condition incapacitated}. Ett mål som lyckas rädda är immun mot Mind-Breaking Howl av alla howlers under de kommande 24 timmarna.

resist.note: while in dim light or darkness

trait.name: Life Hunger
entries: Om en varelse inom 60 fot från Sorrowsworn återfår träffpunkter får Sorrowsworn två fördelar fram till slutet av sin nästa tur: den har fördel på attackkast och dess bett ger 22 ({@damage 4d10}) extra nekrotisk skada vid en träff.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Sorrowsworn gör en bettattack och en kloattack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) stickande skada plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) nekrotisk skada.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} för att träffa, räckvidd 3 meter, ett mål. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) snittskada. Om målet är Medium eller mindre är det {@condition grappled} (fly {@dc 16}), och det är {@condition restrained} tills gripandet upphör. Medan den griper en varelse kan sorrowsworn inte göra en Claw attack.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Hutijin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 22}):
will: {@spell alter self} (can become Medium when changing his appearance)

trait.name: Infernal Despair
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of Hutijin that isn't a devil makes saving throws with disadvantage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Hutijin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Hutijin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Hutijin regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Hutijin dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Hutijin makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, one Mace attack, and one Tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) fire damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The {@condition poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) cold damage.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) force damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) thunder damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: Hutijin teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

reaction.name: Fearful Voice {@recharge 5}
entries: In response to taking damage, Hutijin utters a dreadful word of power. Each creature within 30 feet of him that isn't a devil must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of him for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that saves against this effect is immune to his Fearful Voice for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Hutijin makes one Claw, Mace, or Tail attack.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Hutijin uses Teleport.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Hutijin releases lightning in a 30-foot radius, blocked only by total cover. All other creatures in that area must each make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hydroloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hydroloth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hydroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Secure Memory
entries: The hydroloth is immune to the waters of the River Styx, as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

trait.name: Watery Advantage
entries: While submerged in liquid, the hydroloth has advantage on attack rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hydroloth makes two Bite or Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) force damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.  {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) force damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage.

action.name: Steal Memory (1/Day)
entries: The hydroloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage, and it must make a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to this hydroloth's Steal Memory for 24 hours. On a failed save, the target loses all proficiencies; it can't cast spells; it can't understand language; and if its Intelligence and Charisma scores are higher than 5, they become 5. Each time the target finishes a long rest, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A {@spell greater restoration} or {@spell remove curse} spell cast on the target ends this effect early.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The hydroloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The illusionist casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The illusionist makes two Arcane Burst attacks.

action.name: Arcane Burst
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) psychic damage.

bonus.name: Displacement {@recharge 5}
entries: The illusionist projects an illusion that makes the illusionist appear to be standing in a place a few inches from its actual location, causing any creature to have disadvantage on attack rolls against the illusionist. The effect lasts for 1 minute, and it ends early if the illusionist takes damage, if it is {@condition incapacitated}, or if its speed becomes 0.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Juiblex casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}):

trait.name: Foul
entries: Any creature other than an Ooze that starts its turn within 10 feet of Juiblex must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Juiblex fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Juiblex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Juiblex regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Juiblex dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Juiblex can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Juiblex makes three Acid Lash attacks.

action.name: Acid Lash
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) acid damage. Any creature killed by this attack is drawn into Juiblex's body, where the corpse is dissolved after 1 minute.

action.name: Eject Slime {@recharge 5}
entries: Juiblex spews out a corrosive slime, targeting one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) acid damage. Unless the target avoids taking all of this damage, any metal armor worn by the target takes a permanent −1 penalty to the AC it offers, and any metal weapon the target is carrying or wearing takes a permanent −1 penalty to damage rolls. The penalty worsens each time a target is subjected to this effect. If the penalty on an object drops to −5, the object is destroyed. The penalty on an object can be removed by the {@spell mending} spell.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Juiblex makes one Acid Lash attack.

legendary.name: Corrupting Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) poison damage, and the target is slimed. Until the slime is scraped off with an action, the target is {@condition poisoned}, and any creature, other than an Ooze, is {@condition poisoned} while within 10 feet of the target.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ki-rin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}):

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the ki-rin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ki-rin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ki-rin makes two Hoof attacks and one Horn attack, or it makes two Sacred Fire attacks.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) force damage.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) radiant damage.

action.name: Sacred Fire
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) radiant damage.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The ki-rin moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Smite
entries: The ki-rin makes one Hoof, Horn, or Sacred Fire attack.

trait.name: Dragon's Resistance
entries: The kobold has resistance to a type of damage based on the color of dragon that invested it with power (choose or roll a {@dice d10}): 1–2, acid (black or copper); 3–4, cold (silver or white); 5–6, fire (brass, gold, or red); 7–8, lightning (blue or bronze); 9–10, poison (green).

trait.name: Heart of the Dragon
entries: If the kobold is {@condition frightened} or {@condition paralyzed} by an effect that allows a saving throw, it can repeat the save at the start of its turn to end the effect on itself and all kobolds within 30 feet of it. Any kobold that benefits from this trait (including the dragonshield) has advantage on its next attack roll.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kobold makes two Spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} för att träffa, räckvidd 5 fot eller räckvidd 20/60 fot, ett mål. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) genomträngande skada.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Weapon Invention
entries: The kobold uses one of the following options (choose one or roll a {@dice d8}); the kobold can use each one no more than once per day:

items.name: 1: Acid
entries: The kobold hurls a {@item acid (vial)|PHB|flask of acid}. {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 5/20 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

items.name: 2: Alchemist's Fire
entries: The kobold throws a {@item Alchemist's Fire (flask)|PHB|flask of alchemist's fire}. {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 5/20 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage at the start of each of the target's turns. The target can end this damage by using its action to make a {@dc 10} Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.

items.name: 3: Basket of Centipedes
entries: The kobold throws a small basket into a 5-foot-square space within 20 feet of it. A {@creature Swarm of Centipedes||swarm of insects (centipedes)} with 11 hit points emerges from the basket and rolls initiative. At the end of each of the swarm's turns, there's a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance that the swarm disperses.

items.name: 4: Green Slime Pot
entries: The kobold throws a clay pot full of green slime at the target, and it breaks open on impact. {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 5/20 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) acid damage, and the target is covered in slime until a creature uses its action to scrape or wash the slime off. A target covered in the slime takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

items.name: 5: Rot Grub Pot
entries: The kobold throws a clay pot into a 5-foot-square space within 20 feet of it, and it breaks open on impact. A {@creature swarm of rot grubs|MPMM} (in this book) emerges from the shattered pot and remains a hazard in that square.

items.name: 6: Scorpion on a Stick
entries: The kobold makes a melee attack with a {@creature scorpion} tied to the end of a 5-foot-long pole. {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 9} Constitution saving throw, taking 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 7: Skunk in a Cage
entries: The kobold releases a skunk into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The skunk has a walking speed of 20 feet, AC 10, 1 hit point, and no effective attacks. It rolls initiative and, on its turn, uses its action to spray musk at a random creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 9} Constitution saving throw, or it retches and is {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that doesn't need to breathe or is immune to poison automatically succeeds on the saving throw. Once the skunk has sprayed its musk, it can't do so again until it finishes a short or long rest.

items.name: 8: Wasp Nest in a Bag
entries: The kobold throws a small bag into a 5-foot-square space within 20 feet of it. A {@creature Swarm of Wasps||swarm of insects (wasps)} with 11 hit points emerges from the bag and rolls initiative. At the end of each of the swarm's turns, there's a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance that the swarm disperses.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kobold casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kobold makes two Dagger or Chromatic Bolt attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} för att träffa, räckvidd 5 fot eller räckvidd 20/60 fot, ett mål. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) genomträngande skada.

action.name: Chromatic Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60 feet, one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) of a type of the kobold's choice: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The korred casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The korred has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The korred makes two Greatclub or Rock attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, or 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, or 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

bonus.name: Command Hair
entries: The korred has at least one 50-foot-long rope woven out of its hair. The korred commands one such rope within 30 feet of it to move up to 20 feet and entangle a Large or smaller creature that the korred can see. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition grappled} by the rope (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The korred can use a bonus action to release the target, which is also freed if the korred dies or becomes {@condition incapacitated}.

A rope of korred hair has AC 20 and 20 hit points. It regains 1 hit point at the start of each of the korred's turns while the rope has at least 1 hit point and the korred is alive. If the rope drops to 0 hit points, it is destroyed.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The priest casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The priest can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The priest makes two Thunderous Touch or Thunderbolt attacks.

action.name: Thunderous Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) thunder damage.

action.name: Thunderbolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) lightning damage plus 11 ({@dice 2d10}) thunder damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Voice of the Kraken (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: A kraken speaks through the priest with a thunderous voice audible within 300 feet. Creatures of the priest's choice that can hear the kraken's words (which are spoken in Abyssal, Infernal, or Primordial) must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the priest for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Kruthik har fördel på en attackkast mot en varelse om minst en av kruthikens allierade befinner sig inom 1,5 meter från varelsen och den allierade inte är det {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kruthik gör två hugg- eller spikattacker.

action.name: Stab
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The kruthik sprays acid in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The leucrotta can mimic Beast sounds and Humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations only with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a leucrotta or gnoll that starts its turn within 5 feet of the leucrotta must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the Stench of all leucrottas for 1 hour.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The leucrotta makes one Bite attack and one Hooves attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the leucrotta scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Kicking Retreat
entries: Immediately after the leucrotta makes a Hooves attack, it takes the {@action Disengage} action.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the leviathan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Partial Freeze
entries: If the leviathan takes 50 cold damage or more during a single turn, the leviathan partially freezes; until the end of its next turn, its speeds are reduced to 20 feet, and it makes attack rolls with disadvantage.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The leviathan deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Water Form
entries: The leviathan can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The leviathan makes one Slam attack and one Tail attack.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d12 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 2d12}) acid damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Tidal Wave {@recharge}
entries: The leviathan magically creates a wave of water that extends from a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. The wave is up to 250 feet long, up to 250 feet tall, and up to 50 feet wide. Each creature in the wave must make a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 ({@damage 7d12}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}. The water spreads out across the ground in all directions, extinguishing unprotected flames in its area and within 250 feet of it, and then it vanishes.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The leviathan moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Slam (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The leviathan makes one Slam attack.

resist.note: while in dim light or darkness

trait.name: Psychic Leech
entries: At the start of each of the sorrowsworn's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Thrives on Company
entries: The sorrowsworn has advantage on attack rolls while it is within 30 feet of at least two other creatures. It otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sorrowsworn makes one Harpoon Arm attack, and it uses Sorrowful Embrace.

action.name: Harpoon Arm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) if it is a Large or smaller creature. The sorrowsworn has two harpoon arms and can grapple up to two creatures at once.

action.name: Sorrowful Embrace
entries: Each creature {@condition grappled} by the sorrowsworn must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In either case, the sorrowsworn pulls each of those creatures up to 30 feet straight toward it.

resist.note: while in dim light or darkness

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sorrowsworn makes two Arm Spike attacks.

action.name: Arm Spike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Embrace {@recharge 4}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d10 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition frightened}, and it takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage at the end of each of its turns. The sorrowsworn can grapple only one creature at a time.

reaction.name: Tightening Embrace
entries: If the sorrowsworn takes damage, the creature {@condition grappled} by Embrace takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Extraordinary Leap
entries: The distance of the steeder's long jumps is tripled; every foot of its walking speed that it spends on the jump allows it to jump 3 feet.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Steedern kan klättra på svåra ytor, inklusive upp och ner på tak, utan att behöva göra en förmågaskontroll.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Sticky Leg
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Small or Tiny creature. {@h}The target is stuck to the steeder's leg and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). The steeder can have only one creature {@condition grappled} at a time.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The adept makes three Unarmed Strike attacks or five Dart attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. Once per turn, the adept can cause one of the following additional effects (choose one or roll a {@dice d4}):

items.name: 1–2: Knock Down.
items.entry: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

items.name: 3–4: Push.
items.entry: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet directly away from the adept.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 20/60 fot, ett mål. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) genomträngande skada.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, the adept deflects the missile. The damage it takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 3}. If the damage is reduced to 0, the adept catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and the adept has a hand free.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The marut is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the marut fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The marut has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The marut doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marut makes two Unerring Slam attacks.

action.name: Unerring Slam
entries: {@atk mw} automatic hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}60 force damage, and the target is pushed up to 5 feet away from the marut if it is Huge or smaller.

action.name: Blazing Edict {@recharge 5}
entries: Arcane energy emanates from the marut's chest in a 60-foot cube. Every creature in that area takes 45 radiant damage. Each creature that takes any of this damage must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the marut's next turn.

action.name: Plane Shift (3/Day)
entries: The marut casts {@spell plane shift}, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability. The marut can cast the spell normally, or it can cast the spell on an unwilling creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If it uses the latter option, the targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Charisma saving throw or be banished to a teleportation circle in the Hall of Concordance in Sigil.

monster.name: Master Thief
languages: any one language (usually Common) plus thieves' cant

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the thief is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the thief instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails, provided the thief isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thief makes three Shortsword or Shortbow attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The thief takes the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The thief halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The thief must be able to see the attacker.

trait.name: Assume Form
entries: The maurezhi can assume the appearance of any Medium Humanoid it eats. It remains in this form for {@dice 1d6} days, during which time the form gradually decays until, when the effect ends, the form sloughs from the demon's body.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The maurezhi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The maurezhi makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, its Charisma score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if this reduces its Charisma to 0. It rises 24 hours later as a {@creature ghoul}  unless it has been revived or its corpse has been destroyed.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an Undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Raise Ghoul {@recharge 5}
entries: The maurezhi targets one dead ghoul or {@creature ghast} it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is revived with all its hit points.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Disgorge {@recharge}
entries: The demon vomits in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) acid damage and fall {@condition prone} in the spew.

action.name: Garrote
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target of the meazel's size or smaller. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13} with disadvantage). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the meazel's turns. The meazel can't make weapon attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage

action.name: Shadow Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: The meazel, any equipment it is wearing or carrying, and any creature it is grappling teleport to an unoccupied space within 500 feet of it, provided that the starting space and the destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination must be a place the meazel has seen before, but it need not be within line of sight. If the destination space is occupied, the teleportation leads to the nearest unoccupied space.

Any other creature the meazel teleports becomes cursed for 1 hour or until the curse is ended by {@spell remove curse} or {@spell greater restoration}. Until this curse ends, every Undead and every creature native to the Shadowfell within 300 feet of the cursed creature can sense it, which prevents that creature from hiding from them.

bonus.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the meazel takes the {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any Beast or Humanoid that starts its turn within 10 feet of the meenlock must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the meenlock has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Shadow Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: The meenlock teleports to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of it, provided that both the space it's teleporting from and its destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination need not be within line of sight.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the merregon's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The merregon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The merregon makes three Halberd attacks.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Loyal Bodyguard
entries: When another Fiend within 5 feet of the merregon is hit by an attack roll, the merregon causes itself to be hit instead.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The merrenoloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The merrenoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The merrenoloth makes one Oar attack and uses Fear Gaze.

action.name: Oar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) fire damage.

action.name: Fear Gaze
entries: The merrenoloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the merrenoloth for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: The merrenoloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Telepathic Hub
entries: When the mindwitness receives a telepathic message, it can telepathically share that message with up to seven other creatures within 600 feet of it that it can see.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mindwitness makes one Bite attack and one Tentacles attack, or it uses Eye Ray three times.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d8 + 2}) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}), and it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Eye Ray
entries: The mindwitness shoots one magical eye ray at random (roll a {@dice d6}, and reroll if the ray has already been used this turn), choosing one target it can see within 120 feet of it:

items.name: 1: Aversion Ray
entries: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 2: Fear Ray
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 3: Psychic Ray
entries: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage.

items.name: 4: Slowing Ray
entries: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn but not both. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 5: Stunning Ray
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 6: Telekinetic Ray
entries: If the target is a creature, it must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the mindwitness moves it up to 30 feet in any direction, and it is {@condition restrained} by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the mindwitness's next turn or until the mindwitness is {@condition incapacitated}.

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is telekinetically moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The mindwitness can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Moloch casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 21}):
will: {@spell alter self} (can become Medium when changing his appearance)

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Moloch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Moloch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Moloch regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Moloch dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Moloch makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, and one Many-Tailed Whip attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) force damage.

action.name: Many-Tailed Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d4 + 8}) lightning damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) thunder damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 30 feet in a straight line toward Moloch.

action.name: Breath of Despair {@recharge 5}
entries: Moloch exhales in a 30-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 5d10}) psychic damage, drop whatever it is holding, and become {@condition frightened} of Moloch for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature must take the {@action Dash} action and move away from Moloch by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the {@action Dash} action. If the creature ends its turn in a location where it doesn't have line of sight to Moloch, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Teleport
entries: Moloch teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Moloch makes one Bite, Claw, or Many-Tailed Whip attack.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Moloch uses Teleport.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Moloch uses Spellcasting.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The molydeus casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 22}):

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the molydeus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The molydeus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The molydeus makes one Demonic Weapon attack, one Snakebite attack, and one Wolf Bite attack.

action.name: Demonic Weapon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) force damage. If the target has at least one head and the molydeus rolled a 20 on the attack roll, the target is decapitated and dies if it can't survive without that head. A target is immune to this effect if it takes none of the damage, has legendary actions, or is Huge or larger. Such a creature takes an extra 27 ({@damage 6d8}) force damage from the hit.

action.name: Snakebite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) poison damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw, or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target transforms into a {@creature manes} if this reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This transformation can be ended only by a {@spell wish} spell.

action.name: Wolf Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d10 + 9}) necrotic damage.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The molydeus makes one Demonic Weapon or Snakebite attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The molydeus moves without provoking {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The molydeus uses Spellcasting.

variant.name: Demon Summoning
entries: You can give a molydeus the ability to summon other demons.

entries.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the molydeus has a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance of summoning its choice of {@dice 1d6} {@creature babau|MPMM|babaus}, {@dice 1d4} {@creature chasme||chasmes}, or one {@creature marilith}. A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the molydeus, acts as an ally of the molydeus, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the molydeus dies, or until the molydeus dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The morkoth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}):

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The morkoth can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The morkoth makes either two Bite attacks and one Tentacles attack or three Bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 15 ({@dice 3d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns, and the morkoth can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Hypnosis
entries: The morkoth projects a 30-foot cone of magical energy. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the morkoth for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target tries to get as close to the morkoth as possible, using its actions to {@action Dash} until it is within 5 feet of the morkoth. A {@condition charmed} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns and whenever it takes damage, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature has advantage on saving throws against the morkoth's Hypnosis for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection
entries: If the morkoth makes a successful saving throw against a spell or a spell attack misses it, the morkoth can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 120 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the morkoth. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

trait.name: Mouth of Chaos
entries: The giant is immune to the {@spell confusion} spell.

On each of its turns, the giant uses all its movement to move toward the nearest creature or whatever else it might perceive as food. Roll a {@dice d10} at the start of each of the giant's turns to determine its action for that turn:

items.entry: The giant makes three Fist attacks against one random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, the giant flies into a rage and gains advantage on all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
The giant makes one Fist attack against each creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, the giant makes one Fist attack against itself.
The giant makes one Bite attack against one random creature within reach. If no other creatures are within reach, its eyes glaze over and it is {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn.

The giant makes one Bite attack and two Fist attacks against one random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, the giant flies into a rage and gains advantage on all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and the giant magically regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Demonic Shadows
entries: The nabassu darkens the area around its body in a 10-foot radius. Nonmagical light can't illuminate this area of dim light.

trait.name: Devour Soul
entries: A nabassu can eat the soul of a creature it has killed within the last hour, provided that creature is neither a Construct nor an Undead. The devouring requires the nabassu to be within 5 feet of the corpse for at least 10 minutes, after which it gains a number of Hit Dice (d8s) equal to half the creature's number of Hit Dice. Roll those dice, and increase the nabassu's hit points by the numbers rolled. For every 4 Hit Dice the nabassu gains in this way, its attacks deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage on a hit. The nabassu retains these benefits for 6 days. A creature devoured by a nabassu can be restored to life only by a {@spell wish} spell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The nabassu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nabassu makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack, and it uses Soul-Stealing Gaze.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}38 ({@damage 5d12 + 6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) force damage.

action.name: Soul-Stealing Gaze
entries: The nabassu targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target isn't a Construct or an Undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage dealt, and the nabassu regains hit points equal to half that amount. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0, and if the target is a Humanoid, it immediately rises as a {@creature ghoul} under the nabassu's control.

monster.name: Nagpa
languages: Common plus up to five other languages

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The nagpa casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nagpa makes three Staff or Deathly Ray attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 24 ({@damage 7d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Deathly Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 7d6 + 6}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Corruption
entries: The nagpa targets one creature it can see within 90 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 20} Charisma saving throw. An evil creature makes the save with disadvantage. On a failed save, the target is {@condition charmed} by the nagpa until the start of the nagpa's next turn. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to the nagpa's Corruption for the next 24 hours.

bonus.name: Paralysis {@recharge 6}
entries: The nagpa forces each creature within 30 feet of it to make a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw, excluding Undead and Constructs. On a failed save, a target is {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. A {@condition paralyzed} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Infernal Tack
entries: The narzugon wears spurs that are part of {@item infernal tack|MTF}, which allow it to summon its {@creature nightmare} companion as an action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The narzugon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The narzugon makes three Hellfire Lance attacks. It also uses Infernal Command or Terrifying Command.

action.name: Hellfire Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage. If this damage kills a creature with a soul, the soul rises from the River Styx as a {@creature lemure} in Avernus in {@dice 1d4} hours. If the creature isn't revived before then, only a {@spell wish} spell or killing the lemure and casting true resurrection on the creature's original body can restore it to life. Constructs and devils are immune to this effect.

action.name: Infernal Command
entries: Each ally of the narzugon within 60 feet of it can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} until the end of the narzugon's next turn.

action.name: Terrifying Command
